data.prayer: Father, move the 4,110 believers in the state of Kisoro to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kisoro, Uganda
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Kisoro to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Kisoro.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Kisoro, Uganda a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Gujarati people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, provide a Bible for every believer in Kisoro, Uganda, and teach them to obey it.
data.verse: For if you listen to the word and don’t obey, it is like glancing at your face in a mirror. 24 you see yourself, walk away, and forget what you look like. 25 But if you look carefully into the perfect law that sets you free, and if you do what it says and don’t forget what you heard, then God will bless you for doing it.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Kisoro, Uganda that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Kisoro, Uganda to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

location.name: Kisoro
location.people_groups_list: Kaliko, Nyang'i, Amba, Arab, Lebanese, Hindi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kaliko (13,000), Nyang'i (18,000), Amba (54,000), Arab, Lebanese (15,000), Hindi (5,800)
